title: Robot scans that can spot bowel cancer humans miss
description: Colonoscopies are the 'gold standard' way of diagnosing the disease. This is where the large bowel is examined using a camera attached to a thin, flexible tube.

title: Stroke deaths drop in U.S., but study shows rise in strokes is likely
description: UPI delivers the latest headlines from around the world

title: Proper hydration may extend your lifespan
description: People who drink more water have lower chances to develope heart and lung disease.
